representation_information.name: ESRI Arc Geodatabase
representation_information.description: ESRI Arc Geodatabase is the common data storage and management framework for ArcGIS v 8.x onwards. This data model is expressed in file geodatabases and personal geodatabases for single users, and spatial database engine geodatabases for multi-use and/or enterprise geodatabases.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
